thread.title: Janis Gould
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Janis Gould

author: Janis Gould
title: Janis Gould
text: I ordered a funeral spray for my aunt in Childress, Texas. After assuring me several times they serviced Childress I placed my order. The next day at the funeral - no flowers. I had received a phone call at my home that they had no designers able to do the job. More phone calls and problem getting credit. Terrible company.
